messages.message: Truce? Sorry I picked on you in band... You're fun to hang out with.

Brian
I don't know you, crazy legs.
haha very funny... lol. Are you finished at NAU?? Your littlest brother gave me your business card, lol. It looks like you're doing well. How come you gave up the trumpet?

I can see that your marching skills were passed on to Chase! His leadership audition was amazing! btw it's funny... you taught me how to march... not derek and when i watch the tapes it's neat to see that me and chase have the same style
